questions.question: What is sculpture?
questions.answer: Sculpture is an art form in which figures are made by carving or shaping materials.

questions.question: Which type of art is sculpture?
questions.answer: Sculpture is a form of visual art.

questions.question: What does a sculpture represent?
questions.answer: It represents people, animals or objects.

questions.question: Is sculpture a two-dimensional art?
questions.answer: No, sculpture is a three-dimensional art.

questions.question: Why is sculpture called three-dimensional?
questions.answer: Because it has length, width and height.
